mapper.select: select re.review_id , re.consumer_id , co.name consumer_name , re.product_id , re.rating , re.review_text , date_format(re.created_at, '%y.%m.%d') created_at , po.option_size , po.option_color from review re inner join product_option po on po.option_id = re.option_id inner join consumer co on co.consumer_id = re.consumer_id where po.product_id = #{productId} order by re.created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
select count(review_id) reviewCount , truncate(avg(rating), 1) ratingAvg from review where product_id = #{productId}
